name: The Artsmanship of Mark Rothko - Alpha Version
name_original: The Artsmanship of Mark Rothko - Alpha Version
description:
Made by Caelan Pollock and Kenjiro Goodson

Inspired by the stageplay Red by John Logan.

Support the UW Game Development Club by purchasing the full version in a pack with other Spooky Games! https://uw-gamedevclub.itch.io/uw-gamedevclub-spooky-pack

WASD to move, E to interact
